mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(rid) AS count FROM cc_rest
SELECT COUNT(article_id) AS count FROM cc_article
SELECT COUNT(uid) AS count FROM cc_member

SELECT r.rid, r.name, r.lat, r.lng, count(article_id) AS count, address, phone, operating, signature FROM cc_rest AS r LEFT JOIN cc_article AS a ON r.rid = a.rid LEFT JOIN cc_rest_detail AS d ON r.rid = d.rid GROUP BY a.rid ORDER BY r.rid

SELECT r.rid, r.name, r.lat, r.lng, count(article_id) AS count, address, phone, operating, signature FROM cc_rest AS r LEFT JOIN cc_article AS a ON r.rid = a.rid LEFT JOIN cc_rest_detail AS d ON r.rid = d.rid WHERE r.rid = #{rid} GROUP BY a.rid ORDER BY r.rid;
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO cc_rest_detail (rid, address, phone, operating, signature) VALUES (#{rid}, #{address}, #{phone}, #{operating}, #{signature})
mapper.select: SELECT m.uid, email, nick, create_dt, phone, COUNT(article_id) AS count, info FROM cc_member m LEFT JOIN cc_member_detail d ON m.uid = d.uid LEFT JOIN cc_article a ON m.uid = a.uid GROUP BY uid ORDER BY m.create_dt DESC
